short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prop bomb everyone on the current page with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A prop bomber icon will be added next to the notifications dropdown. Click it and all prop buttons will get clicked for you. You'll need to scroll down to load more of the feed to reveal more prop buttons for bombin' with your fist bump button of awesomeness!
